about_the_game:
This session allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I and II locomotives in easy or realistic mode. This is a 'Free Drive' session only giving you instant access to drive the locomotives.

For further gameplay you can create your own sessions in Surveyor using these locomotives. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'CN' in Surveyor.
detailed_description:
This session allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I and II locomotives in easy or realistic mode. This is a 'Free Drive' session only giving you instant access to drive the locomotives.

For further gameplay you can create your own sessions in Surveyor using these locomotives. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'CN' in Surveyor.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: i5 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics card with 1 GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel 'i' series/AMD K10 series introduced 2009 onwards. 2 physical cores, 2Ghz 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3330/AMD FX 8350 or better, Quad physical core, 64 bit, 2.3Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better/ AMD HD 6950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This session allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I and II locomotives in easy or realistic mode.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
